plot: As Nick and his mother continue to battle the Mauvais Dentes, Monroe and Rosalee fight against the clock to save Juliette. More details are revealed about the source of Juliette's illness, resulting in an epic showdown. Back at the precinct, Hank senses that something is amiss when Nick lands in hot water with the FBI. Meanwhile, Captain Renard continues to reveal himself as he deals with his estranged brother.—NBC Publicity

Nick deals with the Mauvais Dents, who didn't count on a second Grimm, his mother, assisting him, and manages, backed up by Renard, to get rid of his gun, which would have exposed him during the FBI's investigation for their own agent's death. Monroe and Rosalee concentrate on Juliette's condition, but can't cure her. Asalind's mother however prepares a cure, which she enjoys handing to Renard, the only one who can administer it, albeit requiring agony to purify himself first. Renard also contacts his brother, French prince Eric Renard, who admits having sent the Mauvais Dentes but still shifts the blame. Nick finds a link with the cargo of death.—KGF Vissers
